title: Himi 361
lyrics:
8.7.8.7.8.8.7
1.
’E ke tau ‘apasia mu’a,
He ko e potu tapu ‘eni,
‘Oku ‘i heni ‘a e ‘Otua,
He ‘Eiki ‘o e ‘univees
i
;
‘Oku tautau ki ai ‘a Lang
i
,
‘Oku ne poupou mo māman
i
.
2.
’Oku ‘i heni ‘a e ‘Otua,
He Tu’i he kau ‘āngelo.
‘Oku nau lotu ta’e tūkua,
‘O fai he ‘aho mo e pō.
Pe
a
fēfē ha’
a
mau ofi at
u
Ta’e‘aonga ange fau?
3.
’Oku ‘i heni ‘a e ‘Otua;
Mā’oni’oni ange fau.
Ko hai e ala tāpafua
Hono huafa toputapu?
‘E tali ‘emau feilaulau,
Neongo ‘emau ta’etaa
u
.
4.
‘Oku ‘i heni ‘a e ‘Otua;
Ko Tokaima’
a
nanga ia.
He loto ‘oku telefua,
‘Ikai ha me’a ‘e fa’a ‘ūfia.
‘Eiki, ke fuofua luluk
u
‘A homau loto mo e ngut
u
.
5.
‘Oku ‘i heni ‘a e ‘Otua,
Ko e ‘Otua ‘o ‘Isileli.
‘Oku kei tu’u pē ‘a e tu’ung
a
;
‘Oku kei ma’u ‘a e palōmes
i
.
Tau lotu pē ‘o ‘ilo ai,
Tā ko e matapā ‘o Langi. *
